column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Went in on a Sunday morning and got right through the 45-60 min wait by using the app. Very convenient especially on a cold day. Friendly staff and quick service is what I loved. Last thing you want to do in the morning is wait a long time to be helped and served your breakfast. Had the chocolate chip pancakes and the Denver skillet. Denver skillet was great and the pancakes were just good
column2: nothing special. (Walks Bros. Chocolate Pancakes can't be beat) Will try different pancakes next time. Parking around was pricey
